Text: Courthouse Place:  Designed by architect Otto H. Matz and completed in 1893, it replaced and reused material from the earlier 1874 criminal courthouse (the same location of the trial and hangings related to the Haymarket Affair).

Text: Courthouse Place:  The complex included the Cook County Jail and the hanging gallows for prisoners sentenced to death.
